scripts.deploy-dev: npm run deploy-dev-app & npm run deploy-dev-once & npm run deploy-dev-services
scripts.restart-dev: npm run restart-dev-app & npm run restart-dev-services
scripts.deploy-dev-app: cd assets && gulp build && cd ../app/.deploy/develop && PACKAGE_DIRS=~/projects/papapp/rvn-lib/packages:~/projects/papapp/packages mupx deploy
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run deploy-staging-app & npm run deploy-staging-services
scripts.restart-staging: npm run restart-staging-app & npm run restart-staging-services
scripts.deploy-staging-app: cd assets && gulp build && cd ../app/.deploy/staging && PACKAGE_DIRS=~/projects/papapp/rvn-lib/packages:~/projects/papapp/packages mupx deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy-app & npm run deploy-services
scripts.restart-production: npm run restart-app & npm run restart-services
scripts.deploy-app: cd assets && gulp build && cd ../app/.deploy/production && PACKAGE_DIRS=~/projects/papapp/rvn-lib/packages:~/projects/papapp/packages DEBUG=* mupx deploy
